summary: EDEN Gamification Frontend Testing Complete. All 27 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI verified with all features working correctly: HarvestMap with dynamic legend toggle, HarvestTodayTab consuming /api/harvest/v2/today, Territory Management in HarvestAdminConsole, Settings tab with daily goals configuration, RepHome with streak and today's stats, PerformanceConsole overview tab.
critical_code_review_comments: All Harvest V2 API endpoints properly protected with authentication (returns 401/403 for unauthorized requests)
GET /api/harvest/v2/dispositions returns 6 dispositions with code, label, color, points, icon fields
GET /api/harvest/v2/today returns daily stats with doors_knocked, appointments_set, signed_contracts, total_points, goals, progress percentages, streak_days, and dispositions
GET /api/harvest/territories/ returns territories with stats (total_pins, visited_pins, coverage_percent, total_visits, appointments, contracts)
POST /api/harvest/territories/ creates territory with polygon, color, priority
HarvestMap uses dynamic dispositions from API for legend and pin colors
HarvestTodayTab consumes /api/harvest/v2/today for daily stats display
HarvestAdminConsole has 6 tabs: Campaigns, Templates, Territories, Rewards, Redemptions, Settings
Settings tab shows Daily Goals Configuration (Doors Knocked, Appointments Set, Contracts Signed) and Pin Dispositions list
RepHome displays streak banner, Today's Game card with progress bars, Active Competitions, My Territories, Quick Stats
PerformanceConsole has Overview tab with stat cards (Active Competitions, Active Reps, Doors Today, Appointments, Territories, Active Streaks), Quick Actions, Recent Activity
seed_data_creation: Created TEST_Territory_Gamification, TEST_Territory_GetById, TEST_Territory_Assignment via API during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All gamification features fully functional. HarvestMap at /canvassing shows dynamic legend with 6 dispositions (NH, NI, CB, AP, SG, DNK). HarvestTodayTab shows daily stats (22 doors, 2 appts, 1 signed, 39 points), 1-day streak, progress ring. HarvestAdminConsole at /harvest-admin has Territories tab (7 territories with Assign buttons) and Settings tab (Daily Goals: 40 doors, 3 appts, 1 contract). RepHome at /rep shows greeting, streak banner, Start Canvassing button, Today's Game card. PerformanceConsole at /performance shows Overview with 6 stat cards and Quick Actions.

/api/harvest/v2/dispositions.details: Returns 6 dispositions: NH (Not Home), NI (Not Interested), CB (Callback), AP (Appointment), SG (Signed), DNK (Do Not Knock) with code, label, color, points, icon

/api/harvest/v2/today.details: Returns daily stats: doors_knocked=22, appointments_set=2, signed_contracts=1, total_points=39, goals (40/3/1), progress percentages (55%/67%/100%), streak_days=1

/api/harvest/territories/.details: Returns territories with id, name, polygon, color, is_active, stats (total_pins, visited_pins, coverage_percent, total_visits, appointments, contracts)

HarvestMap Dynamic Legend.details: Legend toggle button expands/collapses legend showing all 6 dispositions with colors and counts. Total: 55 pins

HarvestTodayTab.details: Shows greeting, 1-day streak banner, progress ring (22/75 doors), stats grid (22 Doors, 2 Appts, 1 Signed, 39 Points), Active Competitions (6 active), Today's Challenges

Territory Management Tab.details: Shows 7 territories with Assign buttons, stats (Pins, Visited, Coverage, Contracts), New Territory button

Settings Tab.details: Shows Daily Goals Configuration (Doors Knocked: 40, Appointments Set: 3, Contracts Signed: 1) with Save button, Pin Dispositions list with all 6 dispositions

RepHome Page.details: Shows greeting, 1-Day Streak banner, Start Canvassing button, Today's Game card with progress bars, Active Competitions, Quick Stats (Doors Today, Appointments)

PerformanceConsole Overview.details: Shows 6 stat cards (3 Active Competitions, 12 Active Reps, 247 Doors Today, 18 Appointments, 8 Territories, 9 Active Streaks), Quick Actions (Launch Competition, Assign Territories, Configure Goals, Manage Rewards), Recent Activity
